alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Western Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Worcester and northeastern Franklin Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 725 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Northfield, or 9 miles northeast of Greenfield, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Greenfield, Orange, Athol, Winchendon, Montague, Templeton, Barre, Northfield, Bernardston, Shelburne, Erving, Phillipston, Colrain, Gill, Royalston, Petersham, New Salem, Wendell, Warwick and Leyden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Western Franklin
